articles.title: Alec Baldwin's Rust resumes filming after on-set tragedy - BBC
articles.description: The actor has pleaded not guilty to involuntary manslaughter after the film's cinematographer died.
articles.content:
Filming on Alec Baldwin's Western movie Rust is resuming on Thursday, 18 months after the fatal on-set shooting of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins.
